Description: Blue glass spindle whorl or bead; dome-shaped with a slightly conical-sectioned central perforation; made by trailing the glass around a rod or core; signs of wear around the perforation.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Horatio Herbert Kitchener, Earl Kitchener of Khartoum
Curator's comments: See Bailey, Op. Ath VI (1965), pp. 5-13 for details of the Hake-Kitchener excavations in Kourion.
Acquisition name: Transferred from: Victoria and Albert Museum
